name: Mortal Kombat 11: Kombat Pack 2
description: Kombat Pack 2 incl. fighters Mileena, Rain & iconic guest Rambo, feat. actor Sylvester Stallone's likeness & voice.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate
description: The definitive MK11 experience! Take control of Earthrealm's protectors in the game's TWO critically acclaimed, time-bending Story Campaigns as they race to stop Kronika from rewinding time and rebooting history. Friendships are tested, and new alliances forged, in the battle to save all of existence. MK11 Ultimate features the komplete 37-character roster, including new additions Rain, Mileena & Rambo.

name: Neighbours back From Hell
description: There goes the neighborhood! Play the star of a cheeky TV Show who taking revenge on his horrible neighbor by constantly pranking him at home and around the world in the most creative and ludicrous ways.

name: Stream Draws
description: Stream Draws With Twitch is a game that lets the stream chat draw amazing (pixel) art during a live stream. Highly customizable options, 26000 known color names or HTML-Color codes. Draw pixel by pixel or with lines. It has an integrated replay function and saves the final image as screenshot and pixel art.

name: Rooftop Renegade
description: Blaze through challenging levels in rapid action-platformer Rooftop Renegade. Dodge hazards to evade pursuit using parkour skills and powerful abilities. Race through solo challenges, generated levels and chaotic local multiplayer!

name: L@ve Once
description:
L@ve Once (read as "love at once") is a romance visual novel that tells the story of a boy called Shouji Takanashi (高梨 翔司) whose mother is a mermaid. He met mermaids as a small child but forgot about them. One day, his father passes away and not long after, two sisters, who happen to be mermaids as well, come to his place. Their names are Mei and Meru. Being a son of a mermaid, he can only fall in love once, as broken heart would be the end of him. With the help of Mei and Meru, he will hopefully be able to find his true love.

The game originated on PSP and is a light visual novel without any adult content. A year later the game was ported to PS3 with some changes and additional content under the title L@ve Once: Mermaid's Tears. Both platforms have limited edition releases which feature bonus content such as audio drama, artbook or soundtrack.

name: The Third Shift
description: A Gameboy styled 1st/2nd/3rd person horror adventure.

name: Mario Forever Galaxy
description:
Mario Forever Galaxy is a fixed shooter game developed and published by Softendo. Despite being a direct sequel to Mario Forever, gameplay is radically changed from its predecessor, now more reminiscent of games like Galaxian and Space Invaders than 2D platformers like the original Super Mario Bros.

After his defeat on Mario Forever, Bowser rebuilt his army and made it strong again, then proceeded kidnapping Princess Peach, but this time to another planet in the space. Mario then teams up with Luigi, Toad and Samus, to save Princess Peach once more from the hands of Bowser.

Each character has their own skills and a slightly different space ship, with a variety of weapons and upgrades unlockable throughout the game. There's 8 different galaxies the player must clear, each with their own stages and bosses, before reaching Bowser's location and being able to rescue Princess Peach.

name: Stardeus
description: You are an immortal AI that will rebuild a spaceship and explore a vast procedural universe. Unlock the secrets of alien technology, automate factories in space and spoil, neglect or exploit the human survivors.

name: War Identity
description: War Identity is a new first person shooter with a competitive pace. Bringing some old school first person shooting mechanics with a twist. Game modes include team deathmatch, capture the flag, demolition, domination and gun game.

name: Automata Break
description: Stop the escape of the infected automata in this Local Co-op Tower Defense First Person Shooter game for VR. Choose between playing solo or collaborating with a friend to build defensive structures and fight the Automata to avoid their escape.

name: SuchArt: Genius Artist Simulator
description: A unique artist sim game with realistic paint mixing, physics and numerous painting tools. Upgrade and customize your studio, complete tasks, sell and expose art, buy instruments and get famous!

name: Finders, Keepers
description: A hike above ancient woodland on summer solstice.

name: Webbed
description:
Webbed is the story of a happy little spider on an adventure to save her boyfriend from a big mean bowerbird.
Swing through the trees, spin sticky webs, and make friends with bugs! Be the adorable spider you've always wanted to be.

name: Farm Manager 2021
description: Get ready for a logistic challenge in the new and even better Farm Manager 2021! Plan your field work according to the seasons, look after the animals, take care of machines and staff satisfaction and react to the changing weather.

name: Strobophagia: Rave Horror
description: An occult forest rave ⸸ Strange rituals ⸸ Enigmatic organizers ⸸ An ancient evil ⸸ Pure Psychedelic Horror

name: Fire Tonight
description: A narrative puzzle game about two people trying to find their way back together in a city on fire. Maya sets out to find her way across the city by car, train, roller skate and rooftop all while avoiding police barricades, traffic jams and the spreading fire. Confined to his small apartment, Devin anxiously awaits Maya's arrival. He reminisces about their time together as he looks at all the mementos scattered around his place. Will Maya and Devin be able to find each other before the city is engulfed in flames?

name: Glitchphobia
description: Immerse yourself into unstable reality. In order to get out you must exploit glitch in a world around you. You can be sure of one thing, any rules you known no longer exist!! Do you have a courage to dip in it?

name: The Mutineer
description: The Mutineer is a stealth oriented PvP game that takes place in the engine room of a massive warship. Take control of The Mutineer to sabotage the ship and blend in with a crowd of engineers. Another player controls The Overseer, attempting to kick the Mutineer off the ship before it's too late!

name: All Hail the Cook-o-tron
description: All Hail the Cook-o-tron is a physics-based VR cooking game. You play as a contender in a cooking competition designed to hone your cooking and time management skills to ultimately please the robotic food critic known as the Cook-o-tron.

name: Red Colony
description: Red Colony is a 2D Horror Game filled with drama, mystery, zombies and gore. Help Maria find her daughter and get revenge on her cheating Husband, whilst uncovering the truths of the origins of the virus.

name: Cave Hopper
description: Cave Hopper follows the story of a frog that is trying to escape from the dark corridors of a gigantic cave. During this journey, the player has to use its abilities to maneuver through the levels and avoid the many obstacles spread throughout the cave.

name: Shut In
description: Shut In is a short comedy/horror adventure game which explores depression and isolation by trapping you inside your own house.

name: Seawolf + Missile
description: Seawolf! From deep beneath the sea, you fire your torpedoes at the tankers, battleships and other targets. Your mission is to sink more enemy ships than any other sub in the wolf pack. Its a race against time and other subs in your own navy. Missile! Launch guided missiles against cargo planes, bombers and fighters! Two complete games. Hours of fun! 1 or 2 players.

name: 280 Zzzap + Dodgem
description: The title was named after the US advertising campaign for the Datsun 280Z. Players can drive up to 200 miles per hour (320 km/h) while navigating a tricky road course at night. Players must watch out for treacherous turns, nasty competitors, and the ever-present time limit. It is one of the earliest games, if not the earliest, with authorized branding.

name: Hellish Quart
description: A fighting game about sword dueling, in which the blades really clash using physics, and the characters use motion captured fencing techniques. Play as one of many 17th century warriors and use sabers, rapiers, broadswords and many other blades in single player campaign, arcade, or local multiplayer with friends.

name: Syntherapy
description: If an AI were sentient, how would you know if they were malfunctioning, or experiencing a mental health problem? A story-rich game that explores mental health and AI ethics in the form of therapy sessions with a sentient AI.

name: Ronin: Two Souls
description: Create your own adventure with Kenji who wants to be a samurai and is trained for it. But beware, you might go out on your own way in this path, it is entirely up to your choices. Can someone else’s desire of revenge lead your purpose and choices? Or, does he decide that?

name: Brave Mouse Cartographer Trilogy
description: brave mouse cartographer trilogy is a triptych of ambient systems to be enjoyed either on their own or as the basis for a community-based cooperative mapping game. participants work together handing off the role of mapmaker as the group tries slowly to chart on paper (or other preferred external medium) the contours and contents of a wide and mysterious continent from the point of view of our small brave hero clinging dearly to the back of a great bird flying at random according to its own unknowable whims. terrain and landmarks are denoted by both visual and audio cues. as a cooperative game, brave mouse cartographer trilogy is meant to be played over the course of a day or several days by a succession of individuals each adding to or starting anew the efforts of those prior in hopes of accumulating a fuller bigger picture.

name: Sky Squadron
description: Jump into the gunner seat and save your island paradise from the evil invading empire! "Sky Squadron" is an Aussie twist on "Star-Fox" meets VR.

name: Machizzle
description: Physics bending VR puzzle game - get your ball to the goal, by obeying the laws of physics. Or bending them to your will.

name: Stargaze
description: Gaze into the stars as a curious astronomer in this magical VR adventure game. Influence a whole galaxy of planets and their mysterious inhabitants by manipulating a powerful telescope. Take photos of captivating events and fill out your research journal to uncover the secrets of the cosmos.

name: War Yards
description: Step into the shoes of a legendary gunslinger and experience a new kind of VR multiplayer combat. War Yards utilizes a set of unique gameplay systems to seamlessly bring bullet time mechanics to multiplayer matches. The game utilizes a unique set of mechanics that allow each player to control the speed of their opponent's projectiles. These mechanics create an unparalleled combat experience that seamlessly blends fast paced action with tense strategy.

name: Bistro Days
description: Eat, drink, and fall in love at Bellflower Bistro. Bistro Days is a fun, over-the-top romantic story with choice-driven plots and multiple endings.

name: Toad on Fire
description:
Toad On Fire is a fast-paced, action-adventure shooter, with some RPG and puzzle elements sprinkled in. You play as Smokey, a toad armed with a flamethrower, and take the offensive against an invading force of hostile frogs.

Progress through 25+ levels of varying types, ranging from pure action to puzzle-based to boss battles. The flamethrower is your primary weapon, which can be utilized in many ways, for both attack and movement -- dispatch enemies with volleys of fireballs, or charge up a burst-shot that rockets you forward as a blazing toad-missile of death! Collect loot to purchase upgrades.

Whimsical tone. Anthropomorphic characters. Saucy antagonist. Lots of destruction, explosions, power-ups and secret areas. Boss battles. Controller support. Oh my!

name: Melancholy Love
description: Melancholy Love is a Yuri Visual Novel between an elite and a misfit in an All-Girls' High School. How will sparks flare between the two?

name: Bots & Belts
description: Bots & Belts is a game about a robot stuck in a toy factory. The player is tasked with building various toys from parts that must be manipulated to satisfy the orders you are provided. The game can be played solo, with friends online, or on the couch via multiple controllers.

name: D.E.E.P.: Battle of Jove
description: Take fast, campaign-based arcade gameplay with next-gen graphics for an experience known since Star Fox: Barrel-roll, maneuver and fight your way thru deep space and Rogue Squadron-like planet-based missions as the leader of the rebellion

name: Labyrinths of the World: Changing the Past
description: Sin descripción

name: Labyrinths of the World: Fool's Gold
description: Can you save your friend from the world of leprechauns of before your luck runs out?

name: Labyrinths of the World: Forbidden Muse
description: Sin descripción

name: Labyrinths of the World: Shattered Soul
description: Travel through the worlds and save Margaret!

name: Labyrinths of the World: The Wild Side
description: A vacation to India becomes a legendary adventure in the animal kingdom!

name: Infinitode 2: Infinite Tower Defense
description: Infinitode 2 - a strategy in the Tower Defense genre, in which the player will have to build towers to protect his base from endless waves of enemies. The game features huge maps, lots of towers, resource miners, upgrade tree and map editor.

name: Incoming Message
description: Far away space stations and long distance friendships.

name: Age of Ascent
description: Age of Ascent is a truly massive multiplayer space game set in a vast galaxy. It features direct-piloting real-time battles with thousands of ships in a single universe, an entirely player-driven economy, deep strategy, and exploration in an evolving sandbox world.

name: Dam Busters
description: Destroy the dam, or save the dam. Your choice. Play the aggressor and destroy the dam brick by brick. Or play the defender and command your work force to repair any damage done to your dam.

name: Love Chronicles: The Sword and the Rose
description: Scattering the petals of an island kingdom’s magical rose throughout the land, the witch has plunged the kingdom into turmoil and it’s up to you to save the day. Gather the petals, defeat a terrifying beast, and confront the witch in this exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Love Chronicles: The Spell
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Chronicles: Salvation
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Chronicles: A Winter's Spell
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Souls: Timeless Fables
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Legends: The Weeping Woman
description: Sin descripción

name: Drops of Death
description: A murder mystery visual novel with a romantic twist. The killer is randomly chosen and you may unknowingly fall in love with them.

name: Head AS Code
description: Eight captives cooperate or compete for escape, all under the manipulation of a dangerous psychopath. Can you really trust the people around you, or even yourself? It all started that day, in the metro...

name: Living Legends: Wrath of the Beast
description: Sin descripción

name: Living Legends: The Crystal Tear
description: Can you save the kingdom from a crystal curse?

name: Primateria
description: Take a dive in a Card Game experience dipped in Roguelike and Deckbulding. Combine cards together to make them stronger, discover mysterious items imbued with magic, duel divine creatures, perform combos with infinite combinations and possibilities. Can you be the one to reach the surface?

name: Galaxy Life Reborn
description:
Galaxy Life Reborn was a fan project which aimed to revive the Pocket Edition of Galaxy Life by making a private server.
Galaxy Life (developed by Ubisoft) is a real time strategy game where you gather two resources: minerals and gold. You start only with one planet, from which you can rebuild the mighty Starling Empire once again. But beware, the other players have the same goals as you.
Please note that Galaxy Life Reborn is not affiliated with Ubisoft.
As of February 15, 2022, Galaxy Life Reborn shut down its services.

name: Fishing: North Atlantic
description: Commercial fishing in the North Atlantic! Discover the majestic world of Canadian Nova Scotia while admiring the vast diversity of ocean life. Search for the ocean’s gold with upgradable fishing boats and various types of fishing gear as you progress in your career.

name: Brock Crocodile
description: Things are amiss on Crocodillian Island after the four most wanted criminals end up vanishing without a trace from the law. Brock Crocodile, an archaeologist who loves a bit of adventure, finds himself in the middle of all the action as an unearthly being begins a plot that it more than meets the eye. It’s up to Brock and his friends to find out what these cunning villains are planning and put a stop to their evil schemes!

name: Rhyme Storm
description: Rhyme Storm is a freestyle rapping rhythm game that gets you on the beat with visual guides, flashing words, and 3d visualizers that pulse to the music. It features 6 difficulties across 2 modes that go from easy enough for a total beginner to hard enough for even experienced rappers to feel challenged.

name: Delta-Gal
description: A demo version of ZetaGAL. Explore multiple areas, talk with friendly townspeople, fight not so friendly enemies, get better weapons and defeat the boss.

name: Lycanthorn
description:
Lycanthorn is a game inspired by Castlevania, made in 3D!

This short little game will take you through 8 levels of Vampire slaying action

name: AccidentHouse
description: 【This is the fear of someone being behind it】 This is the latest in the QuietMansion (formerly KENGOHAZARD) series. The evolving short horror game that was developed by a 19 years old Japanese student all by himself is coming to Steam! Find the key and escape from the dark, abandoned

name: Test of Courage
description: Test of Courage is a horror game where you have to explore an abandoned school in search of your two friends. The only hint you have is the "Courage Test" in which you have to find 10 objects around the academy while maintaining your sanity.

name: Horror Tales: The Wine
description: Immerse yourself in a post-pandemic island and confront your worst fears! Explore a vast, vertical and mysterious world apparently abandoned and find the precious wine bottle to cure the illness that killed everyone. But be aware; someone is lurking in the dark.

name: In the House of Silence
description: In the House of Silence is a traditional roguelike of eldritch horror. Fight otherworldly abominations, mutate to enhance your power, and stave off insanity as you delve deeper in the House of Silence.

name: Clea 2
description: Clea 2 is a jump scare free, skill-based survival horror sequel to the 2019 adventure.

name: The Night of Joe
description: The Night of Joe is an action-horror game set in a supermarket at night. Joe is trying to exit, to do so he has to find and activate some escalators while a monster is chasing him.

name: P.I.D.
description: Without memories, all you have is your medicine. What happened to the world? What happened to you? P.I.D. is a first-person puzzle and suspense game in which you must survive 5 chapters in one house. Good luck!

name: Stramedia: Injury Plateau
description: Welcome to Stramedia, based in Mt. Injury Plateau, or so it's called right now after your and your classmates' school trip went south. Make your hard calls if needed, as long as you get out of here safe and sound.

name: Super Dungeon Designer
description: Build you own dungeons and share them with others! Link objects together to trigger events. Create challenging puzzles or daunting challenges with the intuitive Build Mode and Linking system in Super Dungeon Designer!

name: Last Message
description: Last message is a short atmospheric thriller / narrative / adventure game that brings you into a world overrun by infected.

name: Desolate Roads
description: Desolate Roads is a first-person psychological horror game. Your car is out of gas in the middle of nowhere and there is nothing else around, just empty roads, a dark forest, and the endless thick and strangling fog.

name: Kinetic Edge
description: Kinetic Edge is a physics puzzle based racing game where you have to figure out the best way to overcome obstacle courses with a shape of your choice. Play on your own, with friends or multiplayer!

name: Nightvision: Drive Forever
description: Experience the first ever road-lite... an intense highway night-driving simulation with randomly generated infinite levels, a rollercoaster story that unfolds through perilous racing, and a fresh world and road to master each time you get behind the wheel. Can you see the night through?

name: Caravan Chaos
description: Caravan Chaos is a multiplayer game where you launch caravans at your opponents until you are the Last Van Standing in the arena. Wreck your friends with crazy caravans across four different game modes in local and online multiplayer!

name: Rhythm Race
description: A racing game in which you don't take the wheel. Get into the music rhythm and accelerate towards victory in this exciting mix of neon, rhythm and futuristic cars.

name: Rolling Hamster
description: Get ready for a revolution in party gaming : Rolling Hamster's, the worlds very first racing game that uses only one button. Race with up to four friends on a single screen. No extra controllers required ! Are you ready to... get your Hamster Rolling ?

name: Star Drift Evolution
description: Star Drift Evolution is a minimalistic racing game about taking corners the most fun way possible: by powersliding! Race on a wide variety of stylized tracks, ranging from simple dirt ovals to challenging rally tracks and perfect your lines. Will you evolve to become a true Drift King?

name: Death Blonde
description: Death Blonde is a local multiplayer racing shooter. Join a world of cursed (blonde) skeletons with cool sunglasses. Isn't that enough for you? Let's also put in cars, drifts, weapons, explosions, and heavy-metal-electronic music, maybe that's more what you're looking for.

name: Foodtruck Arena
description: Foodtruck Arena an unconventional mix of car combat and football game, combines two things that make the world go round: food and sports. Become one of the legendary chefs, take part in an unforgettable tournament, battle against formidable opponents, and climb to the top of the culinary world!

name: Gym Tycoon
description: Gym Tycoon! Build & manage your own gym. Start small and work your way up. Evolve your business into a unique world-renowned gym capable of training prize-winning customers!

name: Quién Habla
description: Multiplayer game about guessing celebrity voices.

name: Phigros
description: Phigros is a completely free, "laneless" music game with dynamic judgement lines and four different types of notes, bringing you a refreshing rhythm experience like never before!

name: Tomb of Dreamers
description: A locus for those who dream deeply.

name: A Vision of the Sublime
description: In deepest dreams.

name: Sun Machine
description: A story of dark days, chronic fatigue, optimism, and nostalgia.

name: Lost Memories Dot Net
description: Lost Memories Dot Net is a game about chatting and building websites as a teenage girl in 2004. You play as 14 year old Nina, chatting with your online friend Kayla about a middle school love triangle, and building your blog between messages. You explore the online world Nina occupies, downloading images to decorate your blog as the drama at school unfolds.

name: Blues for Mittavinda
description: A game about chaos.

name: Sluggish Morss: Pattern Circus
description: A claymation 2d adventure game set in a dark and cryptic future. Another Time Expression, a temporal interference phenomenon, has been predicted leaving those that govern anxious. You will discover its effects on the lives of eight playable characters; a hunter, a dreamer, an artist, a child; a racer, a fighter, a scientist and a detective. Explore an intricate, tactile world full of feverish, intertwining stories told with humour, irreverence and melancholy.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Kurt Irving's First Mission
description: Kurt Irving's First Mission is a pre-order bonus content of Valkyria Chronicles 3. It is also included in the Valkyria Chronicles 3 Extra Edition

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: The Secret of Her Powers
description:
The Secret of Her Powers is a downloadable content for Valkyria Chronicles 3. The DLC contains a mission called Power to Protect and can be purchased for 600Yen from PlayStation Store. In the Valkyria Chronicles 3 Extra Edition, it is among the several DLCs already included with the game.

Unlocked after completing chapter 14.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: No.1 is Restless
description:
No.1 is Restless is a downloadable content of Valkyria Chronicles 3. The DLC contains a mission called Cold War. It was released on February 24, 2011 and can be purchased for 600Yen from the Playstation Store. In the Valkyria Chronicles 3 Extra Edition, it is among the several downloadable contents already included with the game.

Unlocked after completing chapter 13.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - The Barricaded Harbour
description: A Disciplinary Mission addon for the original release of Valkyria Chronicles 3, and later bundled into Valkyria Chronicles 3 E2: EXTRA MISSIONS.

name: JigsawPuzzles.io
description: JigsawPuzzles.io provides a new way for puzzle fans all over the world to unite and cooperatively solve puzzles together. We've hand-picked thousands of beautiful, high-quality, family-friendly images from a variety of talented amateur and professional photographers across the globe. This new-meets-old concept brings cooperative online multiplayer to a gaming tradition that people have enjoyed for centuries.

name: Tenderfoot
description: A view into the city. Tenderfoot is sleeping right now.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - A Clash Battle! Welkin vs. Dahau
description: Welkin Gunter, the hero of the Gaul rescue, Dahow, the man who knows the battlefield. They clashed and fight in one phase of the Gaul front. An episode depicting the battle between heroes and masters from the perspective of the 7th platoon of the volunteer army such as Welkin.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - The War Ends and His Journey Begins
description: Empire General Radi Jaeger disappeared with the end of the Gaul front. Another episode of the end of the war, where Jaeger's own perspective tells what he thought and where he disappeared.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - Behind the Scenes of Cardinal Borgia Escort
description: This episode depicts Cardinal Borgia escort operation, which failed. However, the Dahau who attacked the nameless had another intentions in mind. This episode features Calamity Raven, who depicts the enemy side of Chapter 4.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - The Treacherous Valkyria
description: This battle that takes place against all Valkyria in the alternate timeline, which is not to be considered canon. Can you win against Selvaria, Alicia, Alias, and another new Valkyria?

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - Selvaria at Naggiar
description: Selvaria uses the power of Valkyria in the "Naggiar Battle" on the Gaul front. Audrey Tautou's Gaul troops witness the power of myth. An episode from an imperial perspective with Selvaria as the main character.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - A Clash Battle? Edy vs. Dahau
description: This episode takes place during "Clash! Welkin vs Dahau" DLC. Edy and her self-proclaimed "Edy Squad", who were separated from the 7th Platoon, encounter Lydia and Jig's separate team of Calamity Raven.

name: Utopia, an Essay
description: A brief, experimental exploration/walking game mated to a brief semi-linear essay on futurity, utopia, and space colonization.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex The Targeted Stockpile Goods
description: Black crows flock to the abandoned stockpile. Protect your stockpile from cunning mass attacks!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex Liberate the Aqueduct
description: Bombing sounds echo in the late of night! Destroy enemy command tanks in the bombardment!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex What Lurks in the Desert
description: Bombardment from the sky and hunters on the ground in the dark of night in this difficult vehicle escort mission!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex Steel Trap
description: Heavy-duty unit led by a dark villain suddenly appears in the desert. Break through a steel siege and destroy enemy command tanks!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex The Looming Nightmare
description: The shadow of a giant tank towers over the wilderness... Only two heroines lead a fierce defense battle that is about to begin!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex The Uninvited Crows
description: Break through the defense of the Calamity Unit, led by the young, brave commander who was waiting in the mountain fortress and conquer the enemy's main base!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - Things That Stand in the Way
description: Collect all the recovered supplies through a bombardment, a turbulent interception, and brilliant anti-tank sniper's eyes!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - Fangs of the Viper
description: A vicious hitman lurks in a floating city... Activate the giant drawbridge before you get poisoned!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - Things to Shoot Through
description: Escort an armored car safely from the armed supply base before being targeted by a powerful sniper who also penetrates steel!

name: Comet 64
description: Comet 64 is a programming puzzle game. The year is 1984. All you got is a Comet 64 home computer and the operator's manual it came with.

name: Castle on the Coast
description: A hand-drawn, retro 3D collectathon. Parkour through a magic castle as George the Giraffe! String together sweet moves to explore crystal caverns, stone laden halls, and trippy alternate dimensions.

name: Mind Scanners
description: Mind Scanners is a retro-futuristic management game in which you diagnose the citizens of a dystopian metropolis. Locate a host of other-worldly characters and use arcade-style treatment devices to help them. Manage your time and resources to keep The Structure in balance. Remember, you take full responsibility for your patients.

name: Klaus Lee Thunder in Down Under
description: A classic retro inspired platformer. Rescue trapped miners in Klaus Lee Thunder in Down Under. Play as the living legend Klaus Lee and venture through mysterious caves to uncover its ancient secrets. Beat 26 compact and challenging levels and create countless levels with the integrated level editor.

name: Kipper no Eigo Kyoushitsu: Floppy's Phonics Vol. 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Arkane 20th Anniversary Collection
description: Celebrate 20 amazing years of Arkane Studios with the Arkane 20th Anniversary Collection! With a catalogue that has racked up hundreds of awards, including numerous Game of the Year awards, Arkane Studios has spent the last two decades perfecting its unique style and truly immersive gameplay. From the decaying cobbled streets of Dunwall and the vibrant shores of Karnaca, all the way to the alien-infested, art deco halls of the Talos I space station, the collection spans Arkane Studios’ greatest hits.

name: Instant Chef Party
description: No matter if you like French, Italian,… or Mexican cuisine, cook your way up to the top! In INSTANT Chef Party, you will have to compete with up to 4 players in a series of mini-games themed around food and cook. Be ready to enjoy serving, cooking, harvesting, doing dish-washing and many more activities in coop or versus your friends & family!

name: Balloon Blast
description: Balloon Blast is an arcade style third person PvP game. You play as a robotic vacuum with a knife on the front and a balloon on the back. Pop your enemies balloons to secure victory.

name: Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality
description:
Doctor Who: The Edge Of Reality reimagines last year’s VR experience with brand-new gameplay, new monsters and new worlds to explore.
Wield the sonic screwdriver on a quest to save the universe, guided by the Thirteenth Doctor, voiced by Jodie Whittaker, who is this time joined by the Tenth Doctor, voiced by David Tennant.

name: Squishy Sports
description: Squishy Sports is a bonkers 2D party game where the characters are SHAPES and everything is SQUISHY! Squishy Sports smashes the visuals of Saturday morning cartoons with addictive, local-multiplayer gameplay! Players compete against each other in tons of epic sports modes, with a pickup and play control system so the whole family can get involved!

name: Taivas
description: Taivas is a mysterious action roguelite set in a world of myth, and a time of magic. The destiny of a Canidae Kingdom rests on the shoulders of a young fox alike boy. His name… Joakim. Use spells and special weapons to explore, destroy and fight your way to the UpWorld, and beyond...

name: Nongunz: Doppelganger Edition
description: Nongunz is a roguelite action-platformer described as “The Binding of Isaac meets Cookie Clicker.” Battle grotesque creatures, kill quickly to maintain your combo meter, and rescue worshipers to become part of your idle army to buy upgrades.

name: Glimmer in Mirror
description: Glimmer In Mirror is a Metroidvania-inspired storytelling action-platformer. Allowing you to fix a destroyed world. During the process of exploration, you will enjoy the immersive and dynamic scenarios, gain different skills and items, and meet different monsters and characters.

name: Soulbound
description: In a place of reality, a soul longs for an escape and is not alone; dark things are lurking but energy is your friend. Soulbound is an atmospheric metroidvania platformer packed with action where the past is your future.

name: Tower of Samsara: Hidden Treasures
description: Summon the forces of the Sun to face tough enemies in this hard souls-like puzzle platform 2D when a long dead Plutonian is resurrected by the primordial light of the Sun seeking for a champion to avoid its impending doom.

name: Catventure
description: Pixel art metroidvania platformer about the adventures of a white kitten. Jumps, coins, keys, funny opponents, secret doors - all that. There is even dialogue and a plot.

name: Polter Pals
description: Make ghost friends by steering the living into deadly hazards to release their souls. Puzzle through diorama-style levels and make as many friends as possible using comically fatal accidents. Keep up with the latest memes by getting popular on the afterlife's hottest social media app, LiveBurial.

name: Red Cap Zombie Hunter
description: Human Resistence leader, hires Red Cap as ZOMBIE HUNTER. Red cap will receive information about the areas that are full of zombies and need to be "cleaned" and also about the most strong zombies that are starting to manage their own armies.

name: Tallowmere 2: Curse of the Kittens
description: Lady Tallowmere's kittens have been acting strange. Still, the dungeon's rituals must be carried out. Despite the unusual circumstances, how many rooms can you clear?

name: Shiro
description: Help Holo find her sister. Overcome a dense forest, an ancient temple, dangerous dungeons and destroy enemies in this pixelated adventure platformer!

name: Horned Knight
description: Horned Knight is a challenging 2D action-platformer where you must overcome all fears, enemies, and traps as the Hero Knight. Rewrite destiny, with your trusty sword, young Knight!

name: Escape Planet 17
description: Escape Planet 17 is a 2D action cyberpunk platform game where you can Interact with other characters to create unique paths. Use your fighting, shooting, hacking and scanning abilities to solve crimes, defeat your enemies and escape the Planet.

name: Rodent and Plank: Secret Origin
description: Rodent and Plank is a run 'n gun action platformer that borrows heavily from genre classics such as Gunstar Heroes, Earthworm Jim, and Metal Slug. It's tough as nails and the constantly shifting gameplay styles ensures that there's a surprise around every corner.

name: City 13
description: City 13 is a dynamic 2D platformer. Combining the good old mechanics of classic games straight from the nineties and the modern directions of the hardcore platformer genre, City 13 is the quintessence of the old and new generations and will suit any platformer lover. Hardcore gameplay, varied levels, unique enemies and traps, brutal bosses, all this is for you in City 13.

name: Jetscout: Mystery of the Valunians
description: Jetscout: Mystery of the Valunians is a jetpack-based platformer by Dustin Auxier where you maneuver your way through alien worlds to solve the strange mystery behind the Valunians and their friends who are trapped an enormous containment facility. Play as Muun, a Jetscout initiate as you dash, flip, and burn your way through hostile environments to fight a mind-bending cosmic evil!

name: Tribal Hunter
description:
An action platformer with size-changing mechanics. Be quick and nimble or large and in-charge!

Tribal Hunter is an action platformer. You play as a village guardian who can modify his body shape, allowing him to grow huge and devour enemies. As you grow, you can use this 'growth' as energy to fire projectiles at enemies!

name: Fox face kills!
description: A man in a fox mask invades the abandoned city to help girls from a mysterious phenomenon called “Wolf.” This is a stealth action game where you hide from the wolves on every stage. You then use gimmicks to defeat the enemy and proceed.

name: Dojoran
description: Life is not as easy and simple as it seemed in your childhood. To survive in a world full of dangers, you must go through the difficult ninja training of frogs using secret techniques created by your ancestors.

name: Troupe
description: Find your way in Troupe! A platform adventure inside a castle filled with demons. Explore the depths and top of the castle in search of your troupe.

name: Antonball Deluxe
description: The breakout title from Summitsphere, Antonball Deluxe is a retro, high-octane smorgasbord of ballbusting arcade action! Antonball Deluxe quite literally turns the breakout genre on its head, blending traditional brick-breaking gameplay with tight, intense platforming.

name: Memories of Fireflies
description: Confront your darkness in Memories of Fireflies, a Voxel-based Puzzle Platformer which takes place in a dark and dangerous world that you must venture to discover its secrets. Overcome challenges, enemies and puzzles to get even deeper in this dangerous world.

name: Lost Keys
description: In Lost Keys, you are a boy who is lost in a place full of dangers, find the keys to open all doors and get to the exit.

name: Night Reverie
description: Night Reverie is a Puzzle/Adventure game in which a child must solve the mystery behind the distortion of his house. Explore puzzle-filled environments and discover strange creatures living in the house as you reach the truth behind of what looks like a bizarre nightmare.

name: My Very Own Light
description: Amnesiac with a lantern containing the right part of your brain, escape from the strange realm you’re trapped in. Solve its numerous puzzles and overcome its creatures by cunning and observation while discovering its intriguing hosts.

name: Milo and the Magpies
description: Milo and the Magpies is a point-and-click, hidden object game following the story of a little cat named Milo who is trying to find his way home after getting turned around by an unfortunate encounter with some pesky magpies.

name: Cats Organized Neatly
description: In this 2D puzzle game you have the responsibility to arrange your feline friends in a way that fits the grid. Cats Organized Neatly comes with 80 different handcrafted levels and a whole bunch of cats in all shapes and sizes.

name: Boris the Rocket
description: As a moustached soviet nuclear missile operator, you’re the last frontier of your motherland’s defense. Survive a freezing Siberian winter, untangle nasty bear intrigues and adapt to always changing environment in this cold war simulator.

name: Hiro's Escape
description: Help Hiro sneak past Yamana clan mercenaries during the Onin War of 1467 feudal Japan and reunite with his scattered family in this refugee tale.

name: Palindrome Syndrome: Escape Room
description: You wake up in a spaceship with no memories. In this escape room with a sci-fi setting you will have to investigate your past solving different puzzles. Will you be able to discover what happened to you and how did you get there?

name: Sizeable
description: Sizeable is a puzzle/exploration game about shrinking and growing the environment in order to find all the hidden objects that every little diorama hides!

name: What the Bus?
description: Your commute is simple enough. Or at least, it should be. But today, the entire public transportation system seems to have it out for you - and is it just you, or does the geography keep... shifting?

name: Nemezis: Mysterious Journey III
description: Nemezis: Mysterious Journey III is a puzzle adventure game in which two tourists - Bogard and Amia - find themselves engaged in a series of mysterious events. Solve intriguing puzzles and unfold a story which will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

name: Zoo Economy
description: Zoo Economy is a strategy-puzzle game where you exchange animals. Complete historic based story missions or play in sandbox. Get animals, breed them, attract visitors, sponsor expeditions for unique animals, upgrade zoo and much more.

name: Zorya: The Celestial Sisters
description: In this award-winning cooperative puzzle game, play along with a friend as either Aysu or Solveig and help bring back the night in this never sleeping world. But be careful, you must safely navigate the shadows to solve the increasingly complex puzzles.

name: Aloof
description: Aloof is a puzzle-fighter like Puyo Puyo Tetris, but plays completely different. In the world of Aloof you summon and defend small islands all the while you build combos against your opponent.

name: Rocco's Island: Ring to End the Pain
description: Rocco's Island is a 2D atmospheric puzzle adventure game set in a mysterious world. With Evelyn's magic powers, gather hints to solve puzzles and explore the mysterious world filled with strange creatures and stories. Alas, help Evenly stop the world from Turmoil.

name: Orb and the Stars
description: This stellar story will require reflexion and dexterity! In the spirit of vintage marble board games with puzzles and mazes, use gears and gizmos to lead an orb trough constellations and rekindle all the stars!

name: Sword Slinger
description: Slay goblins with style by using wits and magic in this unique physics-based puzzle game! Craft solutions to each level by combining several magical behaviors together. Levels are open-ended and reward creative and original solutions.

name: Nine Lives
description: To earn its nine lives a cat must survive the nine trials by solving increasingly intricate puzzles, that might require it to die a few times.

name: Control: Override
description: Control: Override is a puzzle game where control itself is a powerup. Solve puzzles, Break through a rogue AI's security layers and confront the truth about why it went rogue.

name: Cramped Room of Death
description: Spear shall be shaken, skull shall be splintered, a blocked way, a bad way, ere the spike rises! Stab now, stab now, stab! Stab for escape and the room's ending! Cramped! Room of! Death!

name: Regrowth
description: Turn barren islands into lush green paradises through puzzles, while the islands and your toolkit may change from level to level.

name: Frame Outsiders
description:
"Even if I'm an outsider, my feelings deceived the world."

Steal the target using "Teleport"! Infiltrate the story in this action-adventure.

name: Oik 3D
description:
Oik is now in 3D!

The return of your favorite game in new quality: now you have to solve a series of puzzles in three-dimensional space!

The player needs to deliver the blue cube to the desired point before getting rid of the blocking elements. A colorful clicker puzzle simulating the laws of physics will help your entire family relax at the computer!

name: Linklight
description: Linklight is a relaxing minimalist puzzle game that consists of rotation based puzzles; unplug yourself from your surroundings as you navigate your way through endless puzzles.

name: Shell Shuffle
description: Gather shells alone or compete with a friend! Simple and fun for everyone!

name: Sok Pro
description: Sok Pro is a sokoban classic puzzle game. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. It's not as easy as it seems. The player can push one box at a time, but do not pull it off. Completely redesigned from scratch, recreated on a new engine and with new functions.

name: Aida: The Beginning of the Story
description: Princess Aida of the Redena Kingdom finds an unknown space while looking around the room of the dead queen. As you explore the space, you learn what happened to you and your queen, and what happened to the kingdom. Aida is the only one who can save a kingdom in danger now.

name: Gu Lady
description: Gu Lady is a cartoon style third person action game. In the game, you'll have an adventure of nightmares and there are also puzzles for you to solve. You'll act Gu JiuXun, a Miao girl, to explore the grave filled with monsters,puzzles and traps,to save her younger...

name: Kapia
description: An adventure of a small girl and her grandfather in a funky apocalyptic world of Kapia. Solve puzzles, play mini-games, interact with eccentric characters to unveil the mystery of the Kapia

name: Blask 2
description: Blask 2 is a unique puzzle game where you control the environment in order to hit all the goal markers with lasers. More levels more mechanics more fun!

name: Lunar Axe
description: After a big earthquake in the city center, ruins of an old building collapse and you end up trapped inside an abandoned house. Find a way out and unravel the mystery of inexplicable tremors, revealing ancient secrets and a mystical artifact, before the city is destroyed.

name: Nienix
description: Search for the legendary lost artifact Nienix through galaxies in conflict! An open world sci-fi online multiplayer action RPG.

name: Rogue Shift
description: Rogue Shift is a high-intensity rogue-lite experience with RPG elements, set on a harsh planet that will test your will to survive.

name: Mesmer
description: A unique revolution simulator where every encounter matters. Mesmer! The pearl of the old world. At least it used to be. But this city has failed its people. Unite the people, spark a revolution and storm the castle. Build a better Mesmer.

name: Stellar Wanderer
description: Stellar Wanderer is a beautiful old-school space opera set in a vast open-world universe. Explore the galaxy and become a FIGHTER, TRADER, TANK or ENGINEER while following the main story line or choosing your favorite side missions.

name: Kargast
description: Kargast is a dark narrative exploration game with light RPG elements, branching endings, and a semi-satirical view of narrative RPGs. It tells the story of an unwell child on the brink of death, and his adventures through his surreal, cryptic surroundings.

name: Dreamshard: Deckbuilding Roguelike
description: Dreamshard is a rogue-like deck-building game where slay the spire meets hearthstone. Explore procedurally generated dungeons, fight monsters, craft a unique deck and defeat your enemies to find the secret of the Dreamshard.

name: Rogue Arrows
description: Rogue Arrows is a roguelite action-rpg. Fight your way through the dungeons by upgrading your bow with powerful items, creating synergies, and choosing the right gear.

name: Hive Mind
description: Hive Mind is a hectic hive management co-op, from 1-4 players. You and your bee friends are desperately trying to fill the remaining honey cells before winter arrives while simultaneously keeping the hives morale above the brink.

name: Frontier Quest
description: Rebuild a frontier town and become acquainted with its community in puzzle-RPG Frontier Quest! Explore the frontier, collect materials and defeat monsters with the right equipment and in order to restore the town and uncover the secrets of the frontier.

name: Twilight Memoria
description: Twilight Memoria Sun and Moon is an RPG game where you play as two kids living their daily life in the setting of fantasy full of monsters.

name: Eterna: Heroes Fall
description: Eterna: Heroes Fall is a true Old-School Turn-Based Tactical RPG featuring a storyline spanning generations, with multiple protagonists, a world filled with magic, glory, and ancient evil. Establish a bloodline of Heroes chosen by the gods to save the continent of Centura from an ancient evil.

name: Zack 2: Celestine's Map
description: Fulfill your greatest quest in a world full of secrets, magic, and supernatural creatures.Choose how you converse with the world carefully.......each choice will have massive consequences.

name: Tale of a Wolf
description: Tale Of A Wolf is a story driven, open world wolf adventure, that puts the fate of Sylvanna in your hands. Join forces with nature and expel man!

name: Illness in the East
description: Adventure RPG with horror elements and a touch of Eastern European history and mythology. The story of two girls who had a hard time of General illness.

name: Skycadia
description: The world of Skycadia is overrun with sky pirates -- and there's profit to be made! Take to the skies and collect bounties by shooting down the scoundrels in this light-hearted flying adventure.

name: Self-Isolation
description: This game is a simulation of self-isolation. You need to support your family, not to lose your job and finally not to go crazy.

name: Bouncer Story
description: Bouncer Story, a retro-inspired film-noir featuring a protagonist working as a bouncer to pay off a gambling debt to the underground mafia controlling the city. As a bouncer you are seeing, hearing and experiencing all kinds of events in the your daily work controlling the entrance to a bar.

name: Black Border Patrol Simulator
description: Black Border is a border cop simulator game that simulates the life of a real border patrol officer. In this game, you assume the role of a police officer of the border present at the entry and exit gates of the country you work and live in. You the player is supposed to check the passengers' papers and stop the smuggling of illegal items and bribery.

name: Tea Garden Simulator
description: Explore tea production intricacies with real-world research, select ideal terroir and clones, master plucking and processing, and create specialty teas for your unique brand. Unravel new flavors, unleash your inner tea scientist, experiment with endless creative ideas, and grow your Tea empire.

name: Dungeon Consultant
description: Dungeon Consultant is a management game where you'll be tasked with taking under-performing dungeons and making them profitable by laying traps, training & staffing high quality minions, and ensuring a particularly frightening aesthetic.

name: Seaside Cafe Story
description: Cook good food, build a nice cafe, and serve happy customers. Do you have what it takes to build a comfy culinary paradise on a tropical island? Test your skills as a chef and cafe owner in this refreshing lite management game!

name: Tree House Survivors
description: Through an "accident" seafarers arrive on an island where they have to fight for their survival. Help them by building and managing a tree house for them.

name: Brocula
description: Embark on an enchanting journey as Brocula, a vampire awakening after centuries. Earn money through part-time jobs, explore the town, salvage your castle, and enhance your vampire skills. Unleash your dark reputation, amass fortunes, and shape your immortal legacy.

name: Death: The Ascension
description: “Sacrifice love to get more money, or do the reverse. You can't have it all. Sacrifices need to be made.” Unique turn-based card game with controllable chance. Get gold, love, and fame, but respect the law.

name: Marble Age: Remastered
description: Marble Age is a turn-based historical strategy where your task is to turn a small Ancient Greek village into a flourishing Polis, powerful enough to conquer the known world!

name: Becastled
description: Becastled is about building and defending your castle from sieges in a fantasy world!

name: Domineon 2
description: Domineon 2 is a fast-paced couch party game straight out of the golden age of arcades. Have intense battles in fully destructible arenas with up to 8 players. Last pixel standing wins.

name: Rise Against the Invaders
description: An alien menace has ravaged Earth. Humanity has scattered to the wind. But hope remains. A resistance is organizing. Build and defend your settlement in this hybrid city-building tower defense game.

name: Para Bellum
description: Single player strategy with puzzle elements and focus on microcontrol. In the game you need to form an army to storm the castles and change formation during the attack. Capture castles and fortifications with various sets of attacking and defending units. Each unit has its own special ability.

name: SugarWinds
description: Do you want to build a Caribbean colony? Load a ship in Europe and set sail. Create your city, trade, and repel Pirates attacks! Starting with a vessel and resources try to thrive in the New World! Can you do it?

name: Tunnel of Doom
description: Tunnel of Doom is an action rogue-lite hybrid that mixes tower defense with melee and ranged combat gameplay. Randomly generated, every run is different as you guide Angel on a quest to rescue her husband. Gather resources, discover perks, and use what you find to battle waves of monsters.

name: Bugvasion TD
description: Alien possessed bugs are attacking your home, stop them by any means with your arsenal of home made bug repellents and insect crushers, think fast, act fast, because the bugvasion is imminent in this classic tower defense strategy game.

name: Arcanbreak
description: A short story-driven game about two inquisitors, Arun and Quila, investigating a murder. During the game you'll control both, each having their own set of skills you'll need to solve the mystery.

name: Gun Skaters
description: Featuring easy controls and addictive skating mechanic, this game is designed to be enjoyed by 1-4 player(s) online or locally. You can play versus each other, work together to kill zombies, or even play a football game This game is super addictive specially with friends and family.

name: Josh Journey: Darkness Totems
description: Josh Journey: Darkness Totems is a hand drawn beat’em up game about four brave heroes, that use their skills to defeat the Nightmare Monsters using special combo attacks in a co-op gameplay.

name: Star Seeker in: the Secret of the Sorcerous Standoff
description: In this short point 'n' click adventure, you are Star Seeker - a WIZARD solving a WIZARD crime to not get put in WIZARD jail by the WIZ- I mean, PLAIN OLD cops. With a useless detective, countless red herrings, and unique dialogue for every evidence combination... will this case ever be cracked?

name: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai
description: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai is a fantasy survival strategy game set in Feudal Japan.Build your town, gather resources, explore new lands, trade with other cities and defend your town against the risen Yokai threat!

name: Crash the Core
description: A roguelike deck builder where you manage a spy agency gathering intel about the secret location of a planet's core system or uncover a conspiracy to take over the galaxy! With a unique battlefield system and a spy agency management metagame that makes your later runs more varied and strategic.

name: Psychocat: The Door
description: Psychocat: The Door is a psychedelic action game that messes with your head and expands your consciousness.

name: Minion Mail
description: Defeat increasingly bigger and scarier hordes of enemies as you summon minions to explode and deliver mail across monster island. You work for the Minion Mail Delivery Service or MMDS. Climb the ranks as you command your minions to deliver mail and destroy any enemy that stands in your way.

name: Revita
description: A fast paced twin-stick roguelite platformer. Climb an ominous clock tower in a series of procedural encounter rooms and past challenging boss fights on your way to reclaiming your lost memory.

name: Fisti-Fluffs
description: You are a cute cat causing chaos against other cats who want to tussle. Property damage guarantee!

name: Push Your Family
description: Push Your Family is a physics-based party game with wacky family members and slapstick humor. Push each other in one of the interactive battlegrounds and be the last to survive or work together as only a family can!

name: Glorious Tournius
description: Are you ready to fight in the Glorious Tournius? Glorious Tournius is an active ragdoll, local physics based multiplayer game. Up to 4 players can battle each other using bombs, guns, melee weapons and your fists.

name: Wildcat Gun Machine
description: Wildcat Gun Machine is a bullet hell dungeon crawler where you take on hordes of disgusting flesh beasts with a wide variety of guns, giant mech robots, and cute kittens.

name: Evade
description: Made under the philosophy that the most fun part of any game is dodging intricate enemy attack patterns, Evade has 33 unique bosses you can take on with 5 playable characters, and 6 different bombs.

name: Demonizer
description:
The fantasy bullet battle to end monstergirl genocide! Turn hateful humans into lovable demons in this 90s arcade style shooter, inspired by Raiden Fighters, Strikers 1945, and Battle Garegga.

The exiled princess Amelia has turned into a succubus and joined the peaceful monstergirl tribe. Then invaders arrive led by her sister Angelina. Fighting back with her newfound powers of hypnosis and demonization she departs to take on the kingdom in a desperate bid to save her new people.

Seven challenging hand-crafted levels packed with beautiful pixel art - defend your forest, fight through towns, break monstergirls out of dungeons, race against cavalry and more

Battle fearsome enemy forces - masses of infantry and artillery, nimble swordsmen and assassins, tricky spellcasters and mighty magical constructs

Capture their souls - transform them into fellow demons and watch their powers grow with yours

Simple game systems reward natural and intuitive play - stay alive, shoot and bomb, and the rest will follow

Three difficulty levels - beginners, enthusiasts, and experts can all enjoy

Rock out to a gritty, stompy YM2612 FM synth soundtrack

Rich retro visual customization - portrait or landscape, low or high res, smooth or sharp pixels, stretch or no stretch

A twist on the old monster-slaying story - includes free digital comic book revealing events before the game

name: 41 Hours
description: 41 Hours is a first-person shooter dramatic game that follows the narrative of Ethan, a workaholic scientist in search of his long-lost wife. The story is intriguing and it takes several surprising turns as it develops over 11 Chapters and 20 hours of gameplay.

name: Firing Vibes
description: Firing Vibes is an online multiplayer shooter where you shoot with music. It also features a tremendous amount of verticality and a unique set of movement abilities to go with it. Outplay your opponents with better aiming, movement skills and a hint of rhythm.

name: Hardest Harvest
description: Grab your pitchfork and dive into the rift! Hardest Harvest is a fast-paced FPS featuring an everfalling arena, endless swarms of corrupted creatures, and adorable vegetable companions.

name: Ardein Arise
description: Protect the ark of humanity by building the ultimate defense from scraps of your enemies. Challenge other players in this tough fast-paced Action Tower Defense game with TONS of bullets and enemies on screen.

name: Rogue Aces Deluxe
description: Rogue Aces Deluxe - the definitive 2D aerial combat roguelike. Explosive single player balletic chaos with sophisticated flight controls. With 1-4 player Dogfight Deathmatch modes and unlockable bonus games. Fly with panache and maintain your moustache!

name: Rubber Bandits
description: Not every heist goes as planned in Rubber Bandits - a physics-based multiplayer brawler for 1-4 players.

name: What the Fork
description: What The Fork - a chaotic couch coop forklift simulation is the best use of forks since dinner! Face the new challenges alone or with up to four players in story, vs or freeplay mode! Operate your forklift to fill up enough trucks within the time limit to unlock new levels and forklifts.

name: Memo
description: Memo is a slice of life story set in an unnamed Japanese city that's neither large nor small. Over the course of a few days, one will experience the life of a male transfer student named Seji who has moved several times a year for most of his life. Compelling experiences spur the youth forward as he reconnects with a childhood town.

name: ArcheAge 2
description: ArcheAge 2 is an MMORPG being developed by Korean developer Jake Song (former developer of Lineage) and his development company, XL Games, a subsidiary of Kakao Games

name: Pirate Commander
description: Take control of a Pirate galley in this innovative simulator to plunder, loot, find treasures, fight enemies from different factions and terrifying sea monsters.

name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed: Ryo Hazuki DLC
description:
Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed Ryo Hazuki DLC

You can now race as Shenmue's Ryo Hazuki alongside other favourite characters in Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed!

• Download now to race as Ryo in his unique transforming vehicle.

name: Mouse Corp.
description: A small and experimental adventure game.

name: Dasra's Cabinet
description: Hoping to score a discount on provisions, a traveler haggles with a merchant named Dasra.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Triangle of Kisses
description: Triangle of Kisses is an original maybe series. In it, you play as Mia Lewis, a woman forced to quit her previous job after a work fiasco with her coworker-turned-ex. Vowing to never again date a fellow co-worker, she quietly moves to Dwight Motors- a new company- to work at, lining up a blind date on the side in order to move on with her life. But the moment her blind date shows up, he has a ring ready, and he's proposing to her like he knows her? Who is this mysterious man, and what does she want with her?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Princess Irene
description: Princess Irene is based off of the novel of the same name. Covering the events of the original novel, you control and play as Princess Irene Victoria Sor, eldest daughter of Ermond, the King of Sor, as well as a tomboy who is forcibly sent to the neighbouring country in order to become Princess Consort and clear the gambling debt her father's accumulated over the years. There, she meets and befriends other princesses, as well as the 1st prince himself and his confidantes. However, not all is as it seems, and those who wish to bring chaos to the land soon play their hand. Can Irene defeat the competition and take the place of Queen whilst its foundation crumbles?

name: Costume Kingdom
description: Costume Kingdom is a Halloween themed turn based action-adventure game set in a open world environment and played from a third-person perspective. The player takes on the role of “Rain” a young child on a quest to beat the Apex Cup while unknowingly saving Halloween.

name: I'm Scared of Girls
description: I’m Scared of Girls, a small RPG Maker 2003 story-driven adventure game developed and published in the rpgmaker.net community by Moga (also known by the username CARRIONBLUE). It tells the story of Lamb, a young cross-dresser who finds himself in a purgatory-like dungeon. There, he must cut the ties to his former life in order to be reborn.

name: Infamous 2: Hero Edition
description:
A special edition dubbed the Hero Edition was announced on February 18 of 2011, and was made available for pre-order. The Hero Edition included:
- A miniature statuette of Cole MacGrath in his neutral state
- A wearable replica of Cole's sling bag
- The first issue of the Infamous DC Comics
- A voucher to download the game's soundtrack
- A voucher for in-game bonus content, including:
-- The Kessler and Reaper skin
-- The Sly Cane, Samurai Sword, Caveman Club, and 24 Karat Gold Amp skins
-- Two exclusive powers: the Lightning Hook and the Electrocution Grenade powers.

name: Yakuza Empire
description: Ruthlessness, ambition, determination – just some of the things you'll need if you want to make it in the unforgiving criminal underworld. This is Yakuza Empire, a strategy/management game about Japan's most feared gang. Think you've got what it takes?

name: The Singularity Trials
description: The Singularity Trials is a VR Swordplay & Physics game where you attack and rebound droids on to targets for massive score multipliers. Defend yourself from incoming attacks! Choose between 3 Solar factions and emerge as their champion. Are you ready to beat the trials?

name: Hard Bullet
description: Brutal physics sandbox VR game with realistic enemy interactions, gore and dismemberment, slow motion abilities, survival modes, lots of guns and cinematic environment destruction.

name: Line Dance Virtual
description: Line Dance Virtual teaches you line dances with virtual reality. Learn the basics in the comfort and convenience of your own home, and be ready to hit the floor dancing when you try it in the real world.

name: Lovely Overseer
description: Lovely Overseer is an animated romantic dating simulator in the furry style. You are a young lieutenant overseeing the correction of magically talented individuals in the closed and isolated complex of the military Academy. Your main task is to maintain order and train recruits.

name: Selene: Apoptosis
description: A beautiful stranger appears at your doorstep. Will you let her in? Dive into an erotic nightmare and decide the fates of those around you in this free mystic thriller visual novel.

name: Lurkers
description: Experience the investigation surrounding the Jack the Ripper crimes putting yourself on the shoes of one of the protagonists in this thrilling mystery Visual Novel!

name: EndlessShinyBlues
description: In an ordinary spring afternoon, the rebellious teenager broke into a quiet corner of the busy city. It was as if Asuka picked up a grain from countless sea sands—the teenager who skipped school and the big sister who skipped class met.

name: Devour
description: Devour is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Stop a possessed cult leader before she drags you to hell with her. Run. Scream. Hide. Just don't get caught.

name: Slide
description: Play quick & fun races with your friends. Ride cute animals through dreamy tracks and use 6 unfair bonuses to outrun the horde! Master the dive to avoid obstacles and gain boosts, and explore environments to find hidden shortcuts.

name: Teknedia
description: Teknedia is a first person arcade platforming game. Jump your way through dozens of vibrant levels, and unlock the mysteries behind this alien world. Compete against your friends and the world for best times, and seek out hidden, difficult to obtain collectibles.

name: Cubia
description: CUBIA is a relaxing 3D puzzle platformer set in an atmospheric world, where the ground rotates under your feet. Solve intriguing puzzles to save the world of CUBIA!

name: Chipmunk's Adventures
description: A picturesque logic game about the adventures of the Chipmunk. Think over your actions, go through obstacles, and destroy traps and dangerous animals. A lot of puzzles that will stick in your memory!

name: Adorable Crush
description: In 2030, humans successfully create a VRMMO Simulation game that players will play in a virtual reality world via a special Headset. You as a player join this game, encounter many girls and seduce them.

name: A Little Shop in Squirrel Town
description: "A Little Shop in Squirrel Town" is an RPG-type Simulation Game. You will become the owner of a grocery store in Squirrel Town. Kill monsters and make equipment, Raise pets and fish, make new commodities, and become the richest businessman in Squirrel Town.

name: Lost
description: Lost is an emotional indie precision platformer that hinders the players ability to see, making every step forward dangerous. Experience a new twist on platforming as you traverse the world of Dolor in search of your runaway puppy. Conquer the darkness or find yourself lost along the way.

name: VR Quiet Life
description: Enjoy a stress-free and freedom nature life with your partner. You can catch insects, fish, cook, etc.

name: Blackout Z
description: Blackout Z is a top-down zombie shooter where you must kill as many endlessly-spawning zombies as you can while avoiding obstacles and finding resources, all as your flashlight's battery slowly runs out.

name: Fibby.io
description:
Fibby.io shows you random images from the web and the game decides if you describe the image truthfully or lie about what you see.
Everyone else interrogates you to find out which.

The goal is to make people think the opposite of whatever you're tasked with.
Make people believe your lies and that you're lying when you're telling the truth.
You can do this by describing the image in a truthful, but unbelievable way.

name: 8-Bit Adventures: The Forgotten Journey
description: 8-Bit Adventures: The Forgotten Journey is a retro-styled JRPG with polish and personality, that focuses less on references (although there are plenty) and more on telling a story.

name: Adventure Inlay
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Cinderella
description: Can you prove your innocence after a string of magical burglaries?

description: Sin descripción

name: Sea of Lies: Mutiny of the Heart
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea of Lies: Nemesis
description: Sin descripción

name: Secret City: Chalk of Fate
description: An otherworldly adventure in the heart of the Big Apple!

name: Secret City: The Human Threat
description: Can you stop a criminal you can't always see?

name: Secrets of the Dark: Eclipse Mountain HD
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Bane of the Family
description: Return to the De la Fer estate to help the count unravel the curse that has been passed down through his family in Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Bane of the Family! Tackle this challenging Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game and track down an all new werewolf that is wreaking havoc on the town. Can you break the curse and save the family? Take on Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Bane of the Family and find out today!

name: Zozzled
description: Hotsy-totsy! It's 1928 and you're madcap flapper Hazel Greene, tottering around the city's finest hotel with a gullet full of giggle juice...until a gaggle of ghosts shows up to spoil the fun by turning every drop in the place into lousy, undrinkable WATER. Explore the beautiful Poseidon Grand Hotel, meet Barnaby Mooch the Magnificent Pooch, and get splifficated on a snootful of ectoplasm in this paranormal puzzle comedy.

name: Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Cursed Wedding
description: Stop a vengeful werewolf in Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Cursed Wedding! After being called to Paris to help your friend Veronica, you find yourself in the middle of a shocking mystery. The ancient werewolf Mephistus has appeared in town seeking revenge on Veronica and her fiancé just days before their wedding. Explore the gorgeous streets of Paris as you uncover the truth behind the ancient werewolf curse in this thrilling Hidden Object game!

name: Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Curse of the Full Moon
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Under the Crimson Moon
description: Sin descripción

name: Shiver: Poltergeist
description: Sin descripción

name: Shiver: The Lily's Requiem
description: Sin descripción

name: Shrouded Tales: Revenge of Shadows
description: Sin descripción

name: Sakura-sou no Pet na Kanojo
description: Sakura-sou no Pet na Kanojo is a visual novel based on a light novel of the same name, developed by Netchubiyori and published by ASCII Media Works.

name: Shrouded Tales: The Spellbound Land
description: When you were only a child, your mother was stolen away from you, banished to the Shadow Realm by a dark sorcerer named Vulture. Now that you’ve grown, your own magic is starting to awaken, and your mother’s book of spells may hold the key to saving her and the entire city of Havenwick from this evil tyrant.

name: Builders of China
description:
Builders of China allows you to manage the economy of various Chinese settlements, from the flooded banks of the Yellow River and the unpredictable North China Plain to the rugged western mountain ranges. 
 Create extensive irrigation systems to tame the hostile land, establish harbors and trading outposts, grow your population, research new technologies and spread your culture and knowledge. Secure the Mandate of Heaven through competent and benevolent rule, or face being overthrown by your subjects.

name: OGSR Mod
description: Sin descripción

name: Surface: Game of Gods
description:
From Elephant Games, makers of Mystery Trackers and Grim Tales, comes a new installment in their ground-breaking Surface series!

When your friends, Jim, Kevin, and Maggie, invite you to participate in a paid research study, you jump at the chance. But things take a bizarre turn when you arrive to discover that Jim and Kevin are missing, and Maggie has just been abducted by a horrific figure! A strange game is spread out on the table, and every move could mean certain death. But you have no choice – you’ll have to play to save your friends’ lives… and your own. Can you make it to the end of the Game? Roll the dice and find out in the thrilling Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Surface: Reel Life
description: Your sister and her daughter, Jane, were enjoying a screening of an old movie, when one of the actors literally stepped off the screen! Now Jane is missing, and the building is crawling with strange plants and animals from the movie. You solve all the puzzles in your way and rush to the theater to find a way into the world of the film to save your niece. But once you do… you realize that the mystery - and the danger - is much deeper than you could have imagined. Can you escape before your adventure becomes a tragedy? Find out in Surface: Reel Life, a thrilling Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Surface: The Pantheon
description:
It should have been a tremendous achievement, but the tunnel through the Ridge of Leviathan became the site of a great disaster. What really happened that day? You were supposed to have been on the train with your husband and daughter, but you missed it. And then they disappeared from your life forever.

It's one year later, and a strange man - a scientist who thinks this is just like the Bermuda Triangle and other such vanishings - invites you to take part in his greatest experiment: To recreate the conditions of that fateful day in Surface: The Pantheon!

name: Surface: The Soaring City
description: Search for your brother, Jeremy, in a beautiful world where the sky is as wide as your imagination in the Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, Surface: The Soaring City! Jeremy was a great inventor who discovered a magnificent land soaring in the sky. He created wings for the people, making them free. The new citizens were happy...until one day Jeremy was kidnapped and blamed for conducting inhumane experiments. It's up to you to save your brother from imprisonment and redeem his good name.

name: Arimaa
description: Strategic board game similar to Chess and Go. Playable online and offline as a traditional board game with physical pieces that can be emulated with regular chess pieces and a traditional chess board.

name: Dangerous Games: Prisoners of Destiny
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Canvas: Blood and Stone
